# ðŸ’‰ Release Checklist - ROUM Token

**Use this checklist for every release to ensure quality and transparency.**

---

## Release Information

- [ ] **Version Number:** v_._._
- [ ] **Release Type:** Major / Minor / Patch / Pre-release
- [ ] **Release Date:** [DATE]
- [ ] **Release Manager:** [NAME]
- [ ] **Approval Date:** [DATE]

---

## Code Changes

### Implementation
- [ ] Code changes completed
- [ ] Comments added/updated
- [ ] Best practices followed
- [ ] No TODOs left
- [ ] Code formatted consistently

### Testing
- [ ] Unit tests written
- [ ] Unit tests passing
- [ ] Integration tests passing
- [ ] Security tests passing
- [ ] Gas optimization verified
- [ ] Edge cases tested
- [ ] Performance acceptable

### Code Review
- [ ] Self-review completed
- [ ] Code standards met
- [ ] Documentation inline added
- [ ] No dead code
- [ ] Security reviewed
- [ ] Approved by lead developer

---

## Security

### Security Review
- [ ] No new vulnerabilities
- [ ] No reentrancy issues
- [ ] Access control verified
- [ ] Input validation checked
- [ ] State management reviewed
- [ ] Event logging verified
- [ ] Error handling complete

### Verification
- [ ] BSCScan verification passed
- [ ] Sourcify verification passed
- [ ] Source code matches deployment
- [ ] No external dependencies
- [ ] No proxy changes (if applicable)

### Security Assessment
- [ ] Static analysis passed
- [ ] Manual review completed
- [ ] Vulnerability scan clear
- [ ] Security approval received

---

## Documentation

### README
- [ ] Information current
- [ ] Installation steps clear
- [ ] Usage examples provided
- [ ] Links correct
- [ ] Contact info updated

### API Documentation
- [ ] All functions documented
- [ ] Parameters explained
- [ ] Return values documented
- [ ] Events documented
- [ ] Examples provided

### Release Notes
- [ ] Version number correct
- [ ] Date correct
- [ ] Summary written
- [ ] Features listed
- [ ] Improvements noted
- [ ] Bug fixes listed
- [ ] Breaking changes disclosed
- [ ] Migration guide provided
- [ ] Security updates noted
- [ ] Links included
- [ ] Contact info included

### CHANGELOG
- [ ] Version section added
- [ ] All changes listed
- [ ] Breaking changes noted
- [ ] Technical details included
- [ ] Contributors credited
- [ ] Links to issue trackers

### Other Documentation
- [ ] INTEGRATION.md updated (if needed)
- [ ] SECURITY.md updated (if needed)
- [ ] DEPLOYMENT.md updated (if needed)
- [ ] FAQ updated (if needed)
- [ ] Governance docs updated (if needed)

---

## Version Management

### Version Number
- [ ] Follows semantic versioning
- [ ] Increment is correct
- [ ] Not already released
- [ ] Documented in files

### Files Updated
- [ ] package.json (if applicable)
- [ ] version.ts/js (if applicable)
- [ ] README.md
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] Release notes
- [ ] Documentation headers

---

## Transparency & Disclosure

### Changes Disclosure
- [ ] All changes documented
- [ ] Breaking changes disclosed
- [ ] Security updates noted
- [ ] Performance impact noted
- [ ] Dependencies listed
- [ ] Migration guide provided (if needed)

### Verification
- [ ] Contract verified on BSCScan
- [ ] Source code verified on Sourcify
- [ ] Verification links included
- [ ] Hash verification included

### Support Information
- [ ] Contact info included
- [ ] Support channels listed
- [ ] Issue reporting process clear
- [ ] Security reporting included
- [ ] FAQ included

---

## Release Preparation

### GitHub Release
- [ ] Tag created
- [ ] Release drafted/created
- [ ] Title formatted correctly
- [ ] Description complete
- [ ] Release notes formatted
- [ ] Files attached (if needed)
- [ ] Links verified
- [ ] Preview reviewed

### Files for Attachment
- [ ] Source code (if applicable)
- [ ] ABI files (if applicable)
- [ ] Metadata files (if applicable)
- [ ] Documentation archives (if applicable)
- [ ] Assets finalized (if applicable)

---

## Testing Before Release

### Functionality
- [ ] All functions working
- [ ] Contract deployable
- [ ] Events firing correctly
- [ ] State changing properly
- [ ] No errors on mainnet

### Integration
- [ ] Works with external tools
- [ ] Compatible with versions
- [ ] Integrations successful
- [ ] APIs responding

### Performance
- [ ] Gas usage acceptable
- [ ] Response times good
- [ ] No memory issues
- [ ] Scalability verified

---

## Communication

### Internal
- [ ] Team notified
- [ ] Changes discussed
- [ ] Approval obtained
- [ ] Sign-off received

### External
- [ ] Release notes prepared
- [ ] Announcements ready
- [ ] Support team briefed
- [ ] FAQ prepared
- [ ] Q&A prepared

### Community Notification
- [ ] GitHub release created
- [ ] Watchers notified
- [ ] Email sent (if applicable)
- [ ] WhatsApp message sent (if applicable)
- [ ] Announcements posted

---

## Quality Assurance

### Final Review
- [ ] All items checked
- [ ] Quality standards met
- [ ] Professional presentation
- [ ] No errors in documentation
- [ ] All links working
- [ ] Formatting consistent

### Go-Live Approval
- [ ] All tests passed
- [ ] Security verified
- [ ] Documentation complete
- [ ] Support ready
- [ ] Monitoring enabled
- [ ] Rollback plan ready (if needed)

---

## Post-Release

### Monitoring
- [ ] Monitoring enabled
- [ ] Alerts configured
- [ ] Logs checked
- [ ] Issues tracked

### Support
- [ ] Support team ready
- [ ] FAQ posted
- [ ] Contact info active
- [ ] Response time good

### Follow-up
- [ ] Feedback collected
- [ ] Issues logged
- [ ] Performance verified
- [ ] Updates planned (if needed)
